title: Setting up content personalization with Lytics
content:
# How to set up content personalization with Lytics Lytics offers powerful personalization capabilities for websites, mobile apps, and campaigns. Here's how to implement personalization: 1. Create audience segments in Lytics (see audience building guide) 2. Navigate to the Experiences section in your Lytics dashboard 3. Click 'Create New Experience' to begin 4. Configure your personalization experience: - Choose the experience type (content swap, targeted message, etc.) - Select target audience segments - Define the delivery channel (web, mobile, email, etc.) - Set up content variations - Configure triggering rules and timing 5. For website personalization, implement the content rendering code: ```javascript // Basic content personalization using Lytics

Welcome to our platform

Discover our standard features

Welcome back, valued customer!

Check out our premium features designed just for you

Welcome to your new experience

Here's how to get started with our platform

``` 6. Test your personalization: - Use the preview mode to see different variations - Check segment qualification using the Lytics User Explorer - Test across different browsers and devices 7. Measure performance: - Set up conversion goals in the experience settings - View performance metrics in the Experiences dashboard - A/B test different content variations Lytics personalization works across channels, allowing you to create consistent personalized experiences across web, mobile, email, and ad platforms.
